We’re listing Shiba Inu (SHIB) in the USA
Bitstamp lists SHIB in the US – the token behind the popular Shiba Inu project.

Here’s SHIB for the USA. You asked, we listened. Again!

After first listing SHIB in other markets, we’re expanding the availability of the popular dog-themed token for our US-based customers who can now buy and trade it on Bitstamp.

As with all our listed assets, this is another opportunity to take advantage of our new no trading fee policy* (see our fee schedule for more details).

Start trading Shiba Inu (SHIB) now

We’re listing the following trading pairs:

SHIB/USD
SHIB/EUR

About Shiba Inu

Ryoshi, the Shiba Inu’s anonymous founder, said that the project is an experiment in “decentralized spontaneous community building”. Here’s a passage from their woofpaper (yes, that’s what it’s actually called):

SHIB has clearly become one the most successful, fully decentralized cryptocurrency experiments in history. This ShibArmy (token holders) was born from the concept that, under the right circumstances, talented individuals from all over the world will unite under one banner and use their unique skills to build something remarkable.

Now, you too can help build something remarkable by trading SHIB on Bitstamp. The opportunities among the likeminded token owners are plenty, such as joining other dog-inspired artists from all over the world in fostering the "artistic Shiba movement" in the NFT space. You might even decide to attend localized meetups, or the once-a-year ShibaCon convention, or help collect donations to rescue real Shiba Inu dogs with the Shiba Inu Rescue Association.

If you want to read more on how the founders created this beloved coin based on Shiba Inu dogs, or how Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin famously donated $1.2 billion worth of SHIB tokens, you can read about it in our “What is Shiba Inu? (SHIB)” guide.

Log in to your Bitstamp account to start trading and get the Bitstamp mobile app (available on the App Store or Google Play) to trade all our cryptocurrencies on the go!

*The 0% trading fee applies for your total trading volume of up to US$1,000 (or equivalent) over the previous 30-day rolling period. Find out more about our 0% trading fee for all coins.

**The listing schedule times might be subject to change.
